00010         Matrix::Matrix(int height, int width)
00011         {
00012             this->height = height;
00013             this->width = width;
00014             values = new float[height * width];
00015             for(int row = 0; row < height; row++) {
00016                 for(int column = 0; column < width; column++) {
00017                     values[width * row + column] =
00018                             (column == row ? 1.0f : 0.0f);
00019                 }
00020             }
00021         }
00022 
00023         Matrix::Matrix(const Matrix &other)
00024         {
00025             this->height = other.height;
00026             this->width = other.width;
00027             values = new float[height * width];
00028             for(int row = 0; row < height; row++) {
00029                 for(int column = 0; column < width; column++) {
00030                     values[width * row + column] =
00031                             other.values[width * row + column];
00032                 }
00033             }
00034         }
00035 
00036         Matrix::~Matrix()
00037         {
00038             delete[] values;
00039         }
00040 
00041         int Matrix::getHeight() const
00042         {
00043             return height;
00044         }
00045 
00046         int Matrix::getWidth() const
00047         {
00048             return width;
00049         }
00050 
00051         void Matrix::setValue(int row, int column, float value)
00052         {
00053             values[row * width + column] = value;
00054         }
00055 
00056         const float &Matrix::getValue(int row, int column) const
00057         {
00058             return values[row * width + column];
00059         }
00060 
00061         const Matrix &Matrix::operator=(const Matrix &other)
00062         {
00063             if(height != other.height || width != other.width)
00064                 LogManager::getInstance()->error(
00065                         "Cannot assign a %dx%d matrix to a %dx%d matrix.",
00066                         other.height, other.width, height, width);
00067             for(int row = 0; row < height; row++)
00068                 for(int column = 0; column < width; column++)
00069                     values[row * width + column] =
00070                             other.values[row * width + column];
00071 
00072             return *this;
00073         }
00074 
00075         const Matrix &Matrix::operator+=(const Matrix &other)
00076         {
00077             if(height != other.height || width != other.width)
00078                 LogManager::getInstance()->error(
00079                         "Cannot add a %dx%d matrix to a %dx%d matrix.",
00080                         other.height, other.width, height, width);
00081             for(int row = 0; row < height; row++)
00082                 for(int column = 0; column < width; column++)
00083                     values[row * width + column] +=
00084                             other.values[row * width + column];
00085 
00086             return *this;
00087         }
00088 
00089         const Matrix &Matrix::operator-=(const Matrix &other)
00090         {
00091             if(height != other.height || width != other.width)
00092                 LogManager::getInstance()->error(
00093                         "Cannot subtract a %dx%d matrix from a %dx%d matrix.",
00094                         other.height, other.width, height, width);
00095             for(int row = 0; row < height; row++)
00096                 for(int column = 0; column < width; column++)
00097                     values[row * width + column] -=
00098                             other.values[row * width + column];
00099 
00100             return *this;
00101         }

00103         const Matrix &Matrix::operator*=(const float &scalar)
00104         {
00105             for(int row = 0; row < height; row++)
00106                 for(int column = 0; column < width; column++)
00107                     values[row * width + column] *= scalar;
00108 
00109             return *this;
00110         }

00112         const Matrix &Matrix::operator/=(const float &scalar)
00113         {
00114             float factor = 1 / scalar;
00115 
00116             for(int row = 0; row < height; row++)
00117                 for(int column = 0; column < width; column++)
00118                     values[row * width + column] *= factor;
00119 
00120             return *this;
00121         }

00151         const Matrix &Matrix::operator*=(const Matrix &other)
00152         {
00153             Matrix result = *this * other;
00154             *this = result;
00155             return *this;

00158         Matrix Matrix::operator*(const Matrix &other) const
00159         {
00160             if(width != other.height)
00161                 LogManager::getInstance()->error(
00162                         "Cannot multiply a %dx%d matrix with a %dx%d matrix.",
00163                         other.height, other.width, height, width);
00164 
00165             Matrix result(height, other.width);
00166             for(int row = 0; row < result.getHeight(); row++) {
00167                 for(int column = 0; column < result.getWidth(); column++) {
00168                     float sum = 0.0f;
00169                     for(int i = 0; i < width; i++)
00170                         sum += getValue(row, i) * other.getValue(i, column);
00171                     result.setValue(row, column, sum);
00172                 }
00173             }
00174 
00175             return result;
00176         }
00177     }
